headline: Hershey (HSY) Expands Shaq-A-Licious Gummies Line With New Sneaker-Shaped Flavors
summary: The announcement of Shaq-A-Licious XL Gummies by Hershey (HSY) and its collaboration with Shaquille O'Neal adds a playful twist to the company's product line. While this innovative launch punctuated Hershey's recent quarter, the company's share price saw an increase of about 12%. The broader market trends, including the S&P 500 and Nasdaq hitting all-time highs, may have bolstered this uptick. Hershey’s recent product diversification efforts, coupled with market optimism reflected in the...

headline: Shaq-A-Licious Just Got Kicks: Shaquille O'Neal Drops Sneaker-Shaped Gummies in Three Bold New Flavors
summary: Shaquille O'Neal, basketball legend and self-proclaimed "biggest kid in the candy store," is lacing up for another sweet win. Introducing Shaq-A-Licious XL Gummies in sneaker shapes, the new addition to his popular Shaq-A-Licious XL Gummies line, which launched in 2024 in partnership with The Hershey Company (NYSE: HSY). Shaq-A-Licious XL Gummies in sneaker shapes are now available at retailers nationwide.
